Articles.Content:
Holy crap this game is awesome. I'm finally here after over a year of pushing from a buddy of mine, and I'm very happy I joined. Especially for the price, I can't believe the breadth of the game and the amount of involvement you can invest into it. I'm truly impressed and happy to be part of the community here. I look forward to the many long hours of launching and swearing I'll be doing in the future.

Cheers!

Edited February 28, 2015 by Old Man Patterson
Welcome aboard! I agree, a game like this would be worth fifty bucks easily. The stars await!

Welcome! So glad you could finally join. You'll find that the community here is one of the best you could possibly find, and we'd all be more than happy to answer any questions you may have in the Gameplay Questions and Tutorials subforum or you can answer other players' questions. You can also watch Scott Manley's youtube channel for all kinds of tutorials.

And remember: any landing you can walk away from . . . probably ended terribly, but at least you walked away from it.

Lhathron
